item.dc:creator: @Dingothedog Dingothedog
item.description:
@Dingothedog wrote:

[quote author=ProjectP2P link=topic=419259.msg3080877#msg3080877 date=1262137850]In the post it says “I can assure you I am well past RS”, which completely goes against what you are doing right now. You have your own server that runs the very same game you said you were past.

People won’t ‘go first’ because they’re scared people will scam their money. At the time of writing that thread I hadn’t played RS in pretty much years, I just logged on because my friend said it was worth a bit of cash. No other reason.I still don’t get why you posted it, it’s publicly available for anyone to see written under the same name I use everywhere yet you act like you’re some detective by finding it when it’s the 3rd result in Google.

Anyways, I believe in a thing c alled Karma, so I’ll let Karma do it’s thing and won’t bother to reply to any of your threads or basically anyone elses.

You say that every time to make yourself look like the decent one yet a few days/weeks later and you’re back again. As I said, it’s history repeating itself, but unfortunately the average IQ in on Mopar is lower than 10 so a lot believe your constant bullshit.

Proof has been laid on a plate to the Mopar staff yet nothing is ever done but in the back of your mind you think it could well happen so you backtrack and act all nice when deep down you’re utter scum. You’re on here for no other reason than to make a quick bit of money off players who trust you. You have no interest in RSC or it’s development what-so-ever, you don’t try to accomplish anything other than a player count so you can continue to make money.

When your server crashed and burned to 1 player online (you), you said over and over again that you had changed and will never sell items again (etc). You pretty much begged for players to forgive you both on here and your temporary PunBBHosting forum. A few days/weeks later and you were selling ‘special items’ and then a few more weeks later you had full blown item ‘donate list’ publicly available on your website for people to purchase any item they want for 20$. You admitted that by doing that last time ruined your economy and promised you would never do it again which meant there would never be any more wipes (as you wiped your server 3-4 times in a year), yet here we are again.

I honestly don’t know how you can even defend yourself, if I was in your position I’d crawl up and die because you look like such a utter spastic to everyone else. I don’t understand what you see when you look in the mirror but I assure you, it’s not what everyone else sees.[/quote]
Doesn’t that make you a hypocrite? You posted your character on original runescape classic up for sale, with no interest or use for the game other than to sell your character for real life cash. Now, you are running your own server, which is hosting the same game that the post claimed you were past for years. What was with the sudden change? Did you realize there was money to be made?

In all honesty, I don’t even think Kryptix has the right to post about anyone making money on the side. As most of you know, Kryptix’s past is not a clean one. He scammed/hacked many people for personal gain dispite anyone else’s feelings. He had many methods of getting what he wanted out of people. Everything from phishing(where he owned runescaqe.com AND rvnescape.com) to keyloggers he used to acquire account names and passwords of many unsuspecting users. Oh, did I mention that he also used the keyloggers to acquire people’s creditcard’s to pay for his membership to runescape and whatever else? Anyone who plays Luke’s server is asking to be keylogged by a bound in client one day, and when you buy something online, only to realize the next day your creditcard has been stolen, you will know who to blame.

Go ahead Luke, try and hit back. /flameon
[center] [/center]

Read full topic

All your little rages and essays about Matt really makes you look pathetic, just let it go dude.

item.dc:creator: @ProjectP2P ProjectP2P
item.description:
@ProjectP2P wrote:

Matt, that's my own personal RSC character that I tried to sell in March, 2009, before I even knew any private server other than RSCD existed. What's your point? I'm really confused here.

In the post it says “I can assure you I am well past RS”, which completely goes against what you are doing right now. You have your own server that runs the very same game you said you were past.

I just find it hilarious. Anyways, I believe in a thing called Karma, so I’ll let Karma do it’s thing and won’t bother to reply to any of your threads or basically anyone elses.

Once again, Sorry Carisa for whatever has happened, hopefully you can get it fixed, take care.

Happy new years everyone. :]

item.dc:creator: @ProjectP2P ProjectP2P
item.description:
@ProjectP2P wrote:

I do play DDO, but I got bored of it real quick, it was a new game my friend showed me. Fun at first, boring afterwards. I then went back and enjoyed my Christmas Holidays and played L4d2 and MW2 instead of DDO.

There is no valid proof that those charges were from me… I’m sorry Carisa for your loss but unless you gave me your credit card info, which you didn’t because only someone as stupid as a doorknob would do that…

There is just no possible way for ME to do that, I am not a super elite hax0r, nor do I want to be, it’s illegal, against the law and it’s just completely wrong at Christmas time.

Once again, sorry for your loss… Hope all goes well.

AND FYI - My staff won’t quit over this…
[center] [/center]
